sense.def:
To identify someone or something
pomeni prepoznati nekoga ali nekaj in povedati, kdo ali kaj je.

seg.quote: The guard had been identified as Victor Kowalski.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
identifies someone
, omogoči, da ljudje nekoga prepoznajo.

seg.quote: Wear on your third finger an iron ring, which will identify you.

sense.def:
To identify with someone or something
pomeni čutiti, da nekoga ali nekaj razumemo.

seg.quote: He couldn't identify with other people's troubles.

sense.def:
To identify one thing with another
pomeni prepričan biti, da sta dve stvari ena in ista stvar;
